name: Chance Encounter - Prologue
description:
This is the prologue to a visual novel in the making, offering some hindsight on the characters' first meeting (as well as a glimpse into the future at the end).

There aren't really any choices to be made, but you can choose the main characters' names as well as the gender identity of the interacting character (for now restricted to she/her, he/him and they/them for a temporary lack of coding support for other pronouns)

I hope you enjoy it!
